items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient library for converting XML to JSON. Perfect for developers needing a simple yet powerful solution to transform XML data structures into JSON format with ease. Ideal for web applications, API integrations, and data parsing workflows.

items.content_html: ConnectMe is a lightweight networking app that allows users to sign up, log in, and send messages to each other. Built using Node.js and Express, it provides a simple platform for user interactions and message exchanges. Ideal for quick deployment and running both locally and on online compilers.
items.title: gitKhilo/ConnectMe: ConnectMe is a lightweight networking app that allows users to sign up, log in, and send messages to each other. Built using Node.js and Express, it provides a simple platform for user interactions and message exchanges. Ideal for quick deployment and running both locally and on online compilers.

items.content_html: Snaply is a lightweight, high-performance JavaScript utility toolkit designed for developers who need to streamline their code with simple, fast, and reusable functions. Whether you're working with arrays, objects, or strings, Snaply helps you tackle everyday tasks with ease and efficiency.
